jumpTooltip: Moves the artist without leaving any marks.
moveTooltip: Moves the artist forward or backward by the specified amount.
notBlackColour: You need to set a color other than black for this puzzle.
numBlocksNeeded: This puzzle can be solved with %1 blocks.  You used %2.
penTooltip: Lifts or lowers the pencil, to start or stop drawing.
tooFewColours: You need to use at least %1 different colors for this puzzle.  You used only %2.
turnRightTooltip: Turns the artist right by the specified angle.
turnTooltip: Turns the artist left or right by the specified number of degrees.
turtleVisibilityTooltip: Makes the artist visible or invisible.
wrongColour: আপনার ছবির রঙ ভুল আছে।  এই ধাঁধার জন্য এটি %1 করা প্রয়োজন।
